markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ratfolk Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1298) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you've learned to run and hide when enemies threaten. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Ratfolk Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Ratfolk Lore
